title: EELS and 4D-STEM Investigation of Strain Induced Ferromagnetic Transition and Domain Formation at LaFeO3/SrTiO3 Interface
content: The detailed mechanisms of strain induced antiferromagnetic to ferromagnetic transition as well as the domain formation in LaFeO3 thin films epitaxially grown on SrTiO3 were investigated using electron energy loss spectroscopy (EELS) and 4-dimensional scanning transmission electron microscopy (4D-STEM) combined with machine learning (ML) analysis.
